#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;

    while(t--)
    {
        string s;
        cin>>s;

        int alph[26]={0};

        for(int i=0; i<s.length(); i++)
        alph[int(tolower(s[i]))-'a']++;

        int count = 0;
        for(int i=0; i<26; i++)
        {
            if(alph[i]>1)
                count++;
        }

        cout<<count<<endl;
    }
}
